snippet.title: NBA playoff predictions 2014, Heat vs. Bobcats: Miami picked to cruise
snippet.description:
NBA playoff predictions 2014, Heat vs. Bobcats: Miami picked to cruise by Dane Carbaugh on Apr 18 2014, 10:22a
The two-time reigning NBA Champions are looking to start things off with a sweep in Charlotte.

snippet.title: Bubba Watson receives his 2nd green jacket, breaks down on 18th green at Augusta
snippet.description:
Bubba Watson receives his 2nd green jacket, breaks down on 18th green at Augusta by Brendan Porath on Apr 13 2014, 7:17p
Bubba gets his second green jacket, and enjoys a moment with his wife and son, who were unable to be there the first time around in 2012.

snippet.title: The Amateur: Throwing up in a race plane
snippet.description:
The Amateur: Throwing up in a race plane by Spencer Hall on Apr 11 2014, 2:38p
What happens when a sports writer drinks a cup of coffee and mans the passenger seat of a competition race plane? Spencer Hall found out during his flight with race pilot Kirby Chambliss.

snippet.title: 2014 Shell Houston Open results: Matt Jones shocks Matt Kuchar with hole-out chip to win playoff
snippet.description:
2014 Shell Houston Open results: Matt Jones shocks Matt Kuchar with hole-out chip to win playoff by Brendan Porath on Apr 6 2014, 4:29p
Another Aussie gets his first win and first Masters invite in the most dramatic finish of the PGA Tour season so far.

snippet.title: Wichita State's incredible season falls short in NCAA Tournament
snippet.description:
Wichita State's incredible season falls short in NCAA Tournament by Jon Benne on Mar 24 2014, 2:33p
The Shockers' quest for perfection ended in heartbreaking fashion Sunday, but the loss to Kentucky shouldn't overshadow what an impressive season Wichita State had.

snippet.title: NCAA Tournament 2014: Schedule set for Sweet 16 games
snippet.description:
NCAA Tournament 2014: Schedule set for Sweet 16 games by Patrick Vint on Mar 24 2014, 8:00a
There are a bunch of intriguing matchups set for Thursday and Friday night, including top-seed Florida squaring off with UCLA and Louisville battling Kentucky.

snippet.title: Peyton Manning's needling spurred Tiger Woods to reclaim No. 1 ranking
snippet.description:
Peyton Manning's needling spurred Tiger Woods to reclaim No. 1 ranking by Emily Kay on Mar 21 2014, 4:15p
Tiger Woods can hand it out when it comes to tweaking his golf buddies, but Peyton Manning landed one ‘hard’ on the then-world No. 2.

snippet.title: 2014 NCAA bracket: Top-seeded Florida hangs on against No. 16 Albany, 67-55
snippet.description:
2014 NCAA bracket: Top-seeded Florida hangs on against No. 16 Albany, 67-55 by Thomas Todd on Mar 20 2014, 7:51p
The Gators were challenged by the Great Danes, but hung on thanks to Patric Young and Casey Prather.

snippet.title: 'Twas the Night Before Free Agency- Dan Snyder edition
snippet.description:
'Twas the Night Before Free Agency- Dan Snyder edition by Eric Sollenberger on Mar 11 2014, 9:12a
Dan's got some salary cap room to spare, and he's going to make damn sure he uses it.

snippet.title: Kevin Love, the Timberwolves' hourglass and straight-up panic
snippet.description:
Kevin Love, the Timberwolves' hourglass and straight-up panic by Tom Ziller on Feb 19 2014, 10:18a
Minnesota doesn't need to trade Kevin Love. But if things don't change, that might change in a year.
